scripts.build-client: emcc -Ibuild/include -Wall -s TOTAL_MEMORY=22216704 -s -Lbuild/lib javascript/source/liboqs-client.c build/lib/liboqs.a -o demo/public/dist/js/liboqs-client.js -s EXTRA_EXPORTED_RUNTIME_METHODS="['ccall','cwrap']" -s ALLOW_MEMORY_GROWTH=1
scripts.build-server: emcc -Ibuild/include -Wall -s TOTAL_MEMORY=22216704 -s -Lbuild/lib javascript/source/liboqs-server.c build/lib/liboqs.a -o javascript/liboqs-server.js -s EXTRA_EXPORTED_RUNTIME_METHODS="['ccall','cwrap']" -s ALLOW_MEMORY_GROWTH=1
